altTitle: 恋人を寝取られ、勇者パーティから追放されたけど、ＥＸスキル【固定ダメージ】に目覚めて無敵の存在に。さあ、復讐を始めよう。
My Lover Was Stolen, and I Was Kicked Out of the Hero’s Party, but I Awakened to the EX Skill “Fixed Damage” and Became Invincible. Now, Let’s Begin Some Revenge
title: Koibito wo Netorare, Yuusha Party kara Tsuihou sareta kedo, EX Skill "Kotei Damage" ni Mezamete Muteki no Sonzai ni. Saa, Fukushuu wo Hajimeyou.
